---
id: update-player
title: "UpdatePlayer"
description: "调用本接口更新指定云端播放器的播放进度、音频转码参数、视频转码参数等信息。"
api: 
info_path: extended_services/cloud_player/zh/server/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>UpdatePlayer</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


调用本接口更新指定云端播放器的播放进度、音频转码参数、视频转码参数等信息。

<Note title="说明">调用频率限制：20 次/秒</Note>

## Request
<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Action","in":"query","description":"> 接口原型参数\n>\n> https://cloud-player-api.zego.im?Action=UpdatePlayer\n","required":true,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["UpdatePlayer"]},"style":"form","explode":true}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"AppId","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。应用 Id，由 ZEGO 分配的用户唯一凭证。可从 <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://console.zego.im/\">ZEGO 控制台</a> 获取。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"number","format":"uint32"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"SignatureNonce","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。16 位 16 进制随机字符串（8 字节随机数的 hex 编码）。生成算法可参考 <a href=\"/cloud-player-server/accessing-server-apis#signature-example\">签名示例</a>。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Timestamp","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。当前 Unix 时间戳，单位为秒。生成算法可参考 <a href=\"/cloud-player-server/accessing-server-apis#signature-example\">签名示例</a>，最多允许 10 分钟的误差。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"number","format":"int64"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"SignatureVersion","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。签名版本号。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"2.0","enum":["2.0"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Signature","in":"query","description":"💡公共参数。签名，用于验证请求的合法性。请参考<a href=\"/cloud-player-server/accessing-server-apis#signature-mechanism\">签名机制</a>生成。","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details>
<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime request"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><ul className={"request-schema-first-body-node-container"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"PlayerId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"云端播放器唯一标识 ID，通过 [CreatePlayer](/cloud-player-server/create-player) 返回。\n<b>调用本接口时，请确保 PlayerId 是已存在的，否则可能会出错。</b>\n","example":"player_1"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Sequence"} required={true} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"请求的序列号，用于保证时序，同个播放器任务的参数修改需要保证序列号的递增。例如：\"Sequence\"：1。ZEGO 服务器将按照最新的配置来更新云端播放器。","example":100}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StreamUrl"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 1024 characters`"} schema={{"type":"string","maxLength":1024,"description":"媒体资源的地址，必须是有效的 HTTP/HTTPS 地址，且长度在 1024 字节以内。\n> **注意**\n>\n> 此处需要根据 [创建云端播放器](/cloud-player-server/create-player) 时，创建的是单播放器还是列表播放器来选择。\n>\n> - 创建单播放器时 `StreamUrl` 参数可选填，`StreamUrlList` 不可选；\n> - 创建列表播放器时 `StreamUrlList` 参数可选填，`StreamUrl` 不可选。\n>\n> <b>如果此处选填了 `StreamUrl` 或者 `StreamUrlList` ，其他的参数会被忽略。</b>\n","example":"https://xxx.com/video/test111.mp4"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StreamUrlList"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"媒体资源列表地址。更新列表将重置媒体资源列表，并立即从新列表的首个资源开始播放。\n> **注意**\n>\n> 此处需要根据 [创建云端播放器](/cloud-player-server/create-player) 时，创建的是单播放器还是列表播放器来选择。\n>\n> - 创建单播放器时 `StreamUrl` 参数可选填，`StreamUrlList` 不可选；\n> - 创建列表播放器时 `StreamUrlList` 参数可选填，`StreamUrl` 不可选。\n>\n> <b>如果此处选填了 `StreamUrl` 或者 `StreamUrlList` ，其他的参数会被忽略。</b>\n","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["https://xxx.com/video/test1.mp4","https://xxx.com/video/test2.mp4"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"BackupStreamUrl"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 1024 characters`"} schema={{"type":"string","maxLength":1024,"description":"媒体资源的备用地址，必须是有效的 HTTP/HTTPS 地址，且长度在 1024 字节以内。当 StreamUrl 参数中的地址访问失败时，云端播放器会尝试访问备用地址。","example":""}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>VideoOptions</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>视频转码参数配置。<b>请注意，该参数不填写时，默认使用上一次调用本接口、或创建云端播放器时的配置。</b></div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Width"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1` and `<= 3000`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"视频宽度，取值范围为 [1, 3000]，且必须是 2 的整倍数，单位为 px。\n<b>请注意，Width 和 Height 任意参数设置为 1 时，都表示纯音频推流；该参数不填写时，默认使用上一次调用本接口、或创建云端播放器时的配置。</b>\n","minimum":1,"maximum":3000,"example":360}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Height"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1` and `<= 3000`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"视频高度，取值范围为 [1, 3000]，且必须是 2 的整倍数，单位为 px。\n<b>请注意，Width 和 Height 任意参数设置为 1 时，都表示纯音频推流；该参数不填写时，默认使用上一次调用本接口、或创建云端播放器时的配置。</b>\n","minimum":1,"maximum":3000,"example":640}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"VideoBitrate"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1` and `<= 50000`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"视频码率，取值范围为 [1, 50000]，单位为 kbps。\n<b>请注意，该参数不填写时，默认使用上一次调用本接口、或创建云端播放器时的配置。</b>\n","minimum":1,"maximum":50000,"example":1200}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schema-description"}>音频转码参数配置。<b>请注意，该参数不填写时，默认使用上一次调用本接口、或创建云端播放器时的配置。</b></div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"AudioBitrate"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1` and `<= 192`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"音频码率，范围为 [1, 192]，单位为 kbps。\n<b>请注意，该参数不填写时，默认使用上一次调用本接口、或创建云端播放器时的配置。</b>\n","minimum":1,"maximum":192,"example":48}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Volume"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 0` and `<= 200`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"音量值，范围为 [0, 200]。\n<b>请注意，该参数不填写时，默认使用上一次调用本接口、或创建云端播放器时的配置。</b>\n","minimum":0,"maximum":200,"example":150}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"SeekTo"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"指定播放进度（秒）。\n<b>请注意，该参数不填写时，默认使用上一次调用本接口、或创建云端播放器时的配置。</b>\n","example":10}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"IsPause"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`0`, `1`]"} schema={{"type":"number","enum":[0,1],"description":"是否暂停播放。\n- 0：正常播放源文件。\n- 1：暂停播放源文件。\n> **注意**\n>\n> 设置暂停播放时不能传入 StreamUrl 参数，否则会忽略其他的参数配置导致暂停播放失败。\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"RepeatTimes"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"播放次数。\n- 1：播放媒体流 1 次。\n- -1：自动循环播放。\n- n：自定义播放媒体流次数，必须大于 0。\n\n<b>请注意，该参数不填写或值为 0 时，默认使用上一次调用本接口、或创建云端播放器时的配置。</b>\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>

QPS 限制，降低请求频率。</td></tr>\n<tr><td>350006002</td><td>网关校验失败。</td><td>请联系 ZEGO 技术支持处理。</td></tr>\n<tr><td>350006003</td><td>无效的输入参数。</td><td>请根据 Message
